main.name: Satvinder Singh
main.bio: Hi there! My name is Satvinder Singh. I am based at Batu Caves and my nationality is a Malaysian citizen. I am 20 years old currently and I am a fresh graduate from INTI International College located at Kuala Lumpur in Diploma of Information Technology. I have 3 months of working experience (internship) in software technical support.
main.language: English , Malay  - Excellent communication in both spoken and written

education.description: Graduated under Dean's Honors Roll for Diploma In Information Technology
Graduated And OBTAIN 7A 2B IN SIJIL PELAJARAN MALAYSIA (SPM)

work.title: Software Technical Support
work.description: Follow up with clients to ensure their IT systems are fully functional after troubleshooting , Talk to staff or clients through a series of actions either face-to-face or over the phone to help set up systems or resolve issues, Prepare accurate and timely reports and document technical knowledge in the form of notes and manuals

skills.name: Advanced Proficiency in Microsoft Office( Word, Excel, Powerpoint)

projects.title: Airbnb Clone (React Js, Tailwind CSS, NextJS, MapBox  )

testimonials.text: Satvinder is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend him in your projects.
Learning with Satvinder has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
